mapper.select: SELECT * FROM fir_devicetypeparameter WHERE Description = #{description} and Id!=#{id} limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE fir_devicetypeparameter SET Description = #{Description}, DataType=#{DataType}, EditorType=#{EditorType}, Unit=#{Unit}, Candidate=#{Candidate}, DeviceTypeId=#{DeviceTypeId}, Reorder=#{Reorder}, Required=#{Required} WHERE Id = #{Id}
mapper.insert: insert into fir_devicetypeparameter( Description, DataType, EditorType, Candidate, Unit, Reorder, Required, Status, Remark, DeviceTypeId) values( #{Description},#{DataType},#{EditorType},#{Candidate},#{Unit},#{Reorder},#{Required},#{Status},#{Remark},#{DeviceTypeId})
mapper.select: select * from fir_devicetypeparameter where DeviceTypeId=#{deviceTypeId} limit #{begin},#{size}
